document.full_text: with media attention focused on turmoil at other network newscasts, nbc's top-rated morning show is quietly weighing its own shake-up as co-host meredith vieira considers a future without "today."
document.title: nbc prepping for meredith vieira's "today" exit
lines_and_colors: with media attention focused on turmoil at other network newscasts, nbc's top-rated morning show is quietly weighing its own shake-up as co-host meredith vieira considers a future without "today."
